languages.text: {n}Прикрыв глаза, Соломон с чувством произносит:{/n} "Мне тебя ножом пырнуть что ли, чтобы ты убрал{mf|ся|ась}..."
{n}With his eyes screwed shut, Solomorne grits out,{/n} "Do I have to stick a shiv in you to get you to leave?"
languages.original_text: {n}Прикрыв глаза, Соломон с чувством произносит:{/n} "Мне тебя ножом пырнуть что ли, чтобы ты убрал{mf|ся|ась}..."

traits.locale_text: {n}With his eyes screwed shut, Solomorne grits out,{/n} "Do I have to stick a shiv in you to get you to leave?"
{n}With his eyes screwed shut, Solomorne grits out,{/n} "Do I have to stick a shiv in you to get you to leave?"
{n}With his eyes screwed shut, Solomorne grits out,{/n} "Do I have to stick a shiv in you to get you to leave?"
{n}With his eyes screwed shut, Solomorne grits out,{/n} "Do I have to stick a shiv in you to get you to leave?"
{n}With his eyes screwed shut, Solomorne grits out,{/n} "Do I have to stick a shiv in you to get you to leave?"

languages.text: {n}Mit geschlossenen Augen presst Solomorne hervor:{/n} "Muss ich Euch aufspießen, um Euch zum Gehen zu bewegen?"
languages.original_text: {n}With his eyes screwed shut, Solomorne grits out,{/n} "Do I have to stick a shiv in you to get you to leave?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit geschlossenen Augen presst Solomorne hervor:{/n} "Muss ich Euch aufspießen, um Euch zum Gehen zu bewegen?"

languages.text: {n}Les yeux fermés par la douleur, Solomorne demande entre ses dents serrées :{/n} « Il faut que je vous donne un coup de poignard pour vous obliger à partir ? »
languages.original_text: {n}With his eyes screwed shut, Solomorne grits out,{/n} "Do I have to stick a shiv in you to get you to leave?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Les yeux fermés par la douleur, Solomorne demande entre ses dents serrées :{/n} « Il faut que je vous donne un coup de poignard pour vous obliger à partir ? »

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙紧紧闭上了眼睛，咬牙切齿。{/n}“非要让我捅你一刀，你才能走人吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}With his eyes screwed shut, Solomorne grits out,{/n} "Do I have to stick a shiv in you to get you to leave?"

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙紧紧闭上了眼睛，咬牙切齿。{/n}“非要让我捅你一刀，你才能走人吗？”

languages.text: {n}Cerrando con fuerza los ojos, Solomorne masculla:{/n} «¿Es que tengo que apuñalarle para que se vaya?».
languages.original_text: {n}With his eyes screwed shut, Solomorne grits out,{/n} "Do I have to stick a shiv in you to get you to leave?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Cerrando con fuerza los ojos, Solomorne masculla:{/n} «¿Es que tengo que apuñalarle para que se vaya?».

languages.text: {n}目を閉じたまま、ソロモーンは歯を食いしばる。{/n}「出て行ってもらうには、ナイフを突き刺さなきゃなんないのか？」
languages.original_text: {n}With his eyes screwed shut, Solomorne grits out,{/n} "Do I have to stick a shiv in you to get you to leave?"

traits.locale_text: {n}目を閉じたまま、ソロモーンは歯を食いしばる。{/n}「出て行ってもらうには、ナイフを突き刺さなきゃなんないのか？」

languages.text: {n}Gözlerini sımsıkı kapamış Solomorne, dişlerinin arasından konuşuyor.{/n} "İlla bir yerinizi mi deşmem gerek?"
languages.original_text: {n}With his eyes screwed shut, Solomorne grits out,{/n} "Do I have to stick a shiv in you to get you to leave?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Gözlerini sımsıkı kapamış Solomorne dişlerinin arasından konuşur.{/n} "Gidesiniz diye illa bir yerinizi mi deşmem gerek?"
